CSIO Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 25 Technical Assistant Posts
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Jul 30, 2025, 14:13 IST
 Central Scientific Instruments Organisation
 25 Jobs |  Posted On : 30-Jul-2025 |  Chandigarh |  Salary : 35,400 to 112,400




FOLLOW

Central Scientific Instruments Organisation (CSIO) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 25 Technical Assistant Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the Diploma in Mechanical Engineering, Civil Engineering, Electronics and Communication Engineering can grab this chance and apply for the CSIO Recruitment 2025. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the posts mentioned below. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online through the website on or before the last date of application. For more details, visit the official website.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Chandigarh.

CSIO Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Technical Assistant	25	Diploma in Mechanical Engineering, Civil Engineering, Electronics and Communication Engineering

Age Limit for the CSIO Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 21 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 28 years.

Selection Process for the CSIO Recruitment 2025

Interview

Salary Structure for the CSIO Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 35,400 /- per month.
The Maximum Salary: Rs. 1,12,400 /- per month

Application fee for the CSIO Recruitment 2025

For SC/ ST/ PwBD/ Women/ Ex-Servicemen candidates: Nil.
For all Other Candidates: Rs. 590 /-

How to Apply for the CSIO Recruitment 2025

Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the Technical Assistant Notification 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Click on the Apply Online link.
Fill out the given details carefully.
Upload the required scanned documents to the application form.
Pay the application fee(if applicable).
Submit the application form and capture the application number for further reference.

Important Dates

Starting Date of Application	26-07-2025
Last Date of Application	15-08-2025
Apply Online	Click Here
Official Notification	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
